entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.US.0168.10097] The concept us-gaap:IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitAtFederalStatutoryIncomeTaxRate is used in the filing with a value of 1,183,000. This element is reported but is not included in a calculation relationship with the element us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit with a value of 1,122,000. The filer should add a calculation relationship between these two elements to capture the details of the effective tax rate reconciliation. If no calculation is required to be disclosed then add an extension element called TaxReconciliationNotRequired.
Rule Element Id:10097 Rule version: 23.0.3 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/788920/000107997323001429/pdex_10k-063023.htm 10076

property.name: label
property.value: Computed "expected" income tax expense on income before income taxes

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0168.10097] The concept us-gaap:IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitAtFederalStatutoryIncomeTaxRate is used in the filing with a value of 1,979,000. This element is reported but is not included in a calculation relationship with the element us-gaap:IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit with a value of 2,354,000. The filer should add a calculation relationship between these two elements to capture the details of the effective tax rate reconciliation. If no calculation is required to be disclosed then add an extension element called TaxReconciliationNotRequired.
